content:
_EventInfo Interface

In this Article

Exposes the public members of the EventInfo class to unmanaged code.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.CLSCompliant(false)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("9DE59C64-D889-35A1-B897-587D74469E5B")]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceType(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsIUnknown)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibImportClass(typeof(System.Reflection.EventInfo))]
public interface _EventInfo

Remarks

This interface is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

This interface preserves the vtable order of the System.Reflection.EventInfo class members that can be accessed by unmanaged COM objects.

Properties summary

Attributes

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.Attributes* property.
DeclaringType

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType* property.
EventHandlerType

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.EventHandlerType* property.
IsMulticast

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.IsMulticast* property.
IsSpecialName

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.IsSpecialName* property.
MemberType

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.MemberType* property.
Name

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name* property.
ReflectedType

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType* property.

Methods summary

AddEventHandler(Object,Delegate)

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.AddEventHandler* method.
Equals(Object)

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Object.Equals* method.
GetAddMethod()

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.GetAddMethod* method.
GetAddMethod(Boolean)

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.GetAddMethod* method.
GetCustomAttributes(Boolean)

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes* method.
GetCustomAttributes(Type,Boolean)

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes* method.
GetHashCode()

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Object.GetHashCode* method.
GetIDsOfNames(Guid,IntPtr,UInt32,UInt32,IntPtr)

Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.
GetRaiseMethod()

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRaiseMethod* method.
GetRaiseMethod(Boolean)

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRaiseMethod* method.
GetRemoveMethod()

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRemoveMethod* method.
GetRemoveMethod(Boolean)

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRemoveMethod* method.
GetType()

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Object.GetType* method.
GetTypeInfo(UInt32,UInt32,IntPtr)

Retrieves the type information for an object, which can be used to get the type information for an interface.
GetTypeInfoCount(UInt32)

Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).
Invoke(UInt32,Guid,UInt32,Int16,IntPtr,IntPtr,IntPtr,IntPtr)

Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.
IsDefined(Type,Boolean)

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined* method.
RemoveEventHandler(Object,Delegate)

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.RemoveEventHandler* method.
ToString()

Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Object.ToString* method.

Properties

  • Attributes

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.Attributes* property.

    public System.Reflection.EventAttributes Attributes { get; }

    Property Value

    • EventAttributes

      The read-only attributes for this event.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The Attributes property gets the attributes for this event.

  • DeclaringType

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType* property.

    public Type DeclaringType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The Type object for the class that declares this member.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The DeclaringType property gets the class that declares this member.

  • EventHandlerType

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.EventHandlerType* property.

    public Type EventHandlerType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      A read-only Type object representing the delegate event handler.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The EventHandlerType property gets the Type object of the underlying event-handler delegate associated with this event.

  • IsMulticast

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.IsMulticast* property.

    public bool IsMulticast { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the delegate is an instance of a multicast delegate; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The IsMulticast property gets a value indicating whether the event is multicast.

  • IsSpecialName

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.IsSpecialName* property.

    public bool IsSpecialName { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if this event has a special name; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The IsSpecialName property gets a value indicating whether the EventInfo object has a name with a special meaning.

  • MemberType

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.MemberType* property.

    public System.Reflection.MemberTypes MemberType { get; }

    Property Value

    • MemberTypes

      A MemberTypes value indicating that this member is an event.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The MemberType property gets a MemberTypes value indicating that this member is an event.

  • Name

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name* property.

    public string Name { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A String object containing the name of this member.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The Name property gets the name of the current member.

  • ReflectedType

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType* property.

    public Type ReflectedType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The Type object that was used to obtain this object.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The ReflectedType property gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance.

Methods

  • AddEventHandler(Object,Delegate)

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.AddEventHandler* method.

    public void AddEventHandler (object target, Delegate handler);

    Parameters

    • target
      Object

      The event source.

    • handler
      Delegate

      A method or methods to be invoked when the event is raised by the target.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The AddEventHandler method adds an event handler to an event source.

  • Equals(Object)

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Object.Equals* method.

    public bool Equals (object other);

    Parameters

    • other
      Object

      The Object to compare with the current Object.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the specified Object is equal to the current Object; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The Equals method determines whether the specified Object is equal to the current Object.

  • GetAddMethod()

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.GetAddMethod* method.

    public System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetAddMethod ();

    Returns

    • MethodInfo

      A MethodInfo object representing the method used to add an event-handler delegate to the event source.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The GetAddMethod method returns the method used to add an event-handler delegate to the event source.

  • GetAddMethod(Boolean)

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.GetAddMethod* method.

    public System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetAddMethod (bool nonPublic);

    Parameters

    • nonPublic
      Boolean

      true to return non-public methods; otherwise, false.

    Returns

    • MethodInfo

      A MethodInfo object representing the method used to add an event-handler delegate to the event source.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The GetAddMethod method retrieves the MethodInfo object for the AddEventHandler method of the event and specifies whether to return non-public methods

  • GetCustomAttributes(Boolean)

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes* method.

    public object[] GetCustomAttributes (bool inherit);

    Parameters

    • inherit
      Boolean

      true to search a member's inheritance chain to find the attributes; otherwise, false.

    Returns

    • Object[]

      An array that contains all the custom attributes, or an array with zero (0) elements if no attributes are defined.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The GetCustomAttributes method retrieves the MethodInfo object for the AddEventHandler method of the event and specifies whether to return non-public methods

  • GetCustomAttributes(Type,Boolean)

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes* method.

    public object[] GetCustomAttributes (Type attributeType, bool inherit);

    Parameters

    • attributeType
      Type

      The type of attribute to search for. Only attributes that are assignable to this type are returned.

    • inherit
      Boolean

      true to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes; otherwise, false.

    Returns

    • Object[]

      An array of custom attributes applied to this member, or an array with zero (0) elements if no attributes have been applied.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The GetCustomAttributes method returns an array of custom attributes identified by Type.

  • GetHashCode()

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Object.GetHashCode* method.

    public int GetHashCode ();

    Returns

    • Int32

      The hash code for the current instance.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The GetHashCode method serves as a hash function for a particular type. GetHashCode is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

  • GetIDsOfNames(Guid,IntPtr,UInt32,UInt32,IntPtr)

    Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.

    public void GetIDsOfNames (ref Guid riid, IntPtr rgszNames, uint cNames, uint lcid, IntPtr rgDispId);

    Parameters

    • riid
      Guid

      Reserved for future use. Must be IID_NULL.

    • rgszNames
      IntPtr

      An array of names to be mapped.

    • cNames
      UInt32

      The count of the names to be mapped.

    • lcid
      UInt32

      The locale context in which to interpret the names.

    • rgDispId
      IntPtr

      An array allocated by the caller that receives the identifiers corresponding to the names.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code. For more information about IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames, see the MSDN Library.

  • GetRaiseMethod()

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRaiseMethod* method.

    public System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetRaiseMethod ();

    Returns

    • MethodInfo

      The method that is called when the event is raised.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The GetRaiseMethod method returns the method that is called when the event is raised.

  • GetRaiseMethod(Boolean)

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRaiseMethod* method.

    public System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetRaiseMethod (bool nonPublic);

    Parameters

    • nonPublic
      Boolean

      true to return non-public methods; otherwise, false.

    Returns

    • MethodInfo

      The MethodInfo object that was called when the event was raised.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The GetRaiseMethod method returns the method that is called when the event is raised and specifies whether to return non-public methods.

  • GetRemoveMethod()

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRemoveMethod* method.

    public System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetRemoveMethod ();

    Returns

    • MethodInfo

      A MethodInfo object representing the method used to remove an event-handler delegate from the event source.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The GetRemoveMethod method returns the method used to remove an event-handler delegate from the event source.

  • GetRemoveMethod(Boolean)

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRemoveMethod* method.

    public System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetRemoveMethod (bool nonPublic);

    Parameters

    • nonPublic
      Boolean

      true to return non-public methods; otherwise, false.

    Returns

    • MethodInfo

      A MethodInfo object representing the method used to remove an event-handler delegate from the event source.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The GetRemoveMethod method retrieves the MethodInfo object for removing a method of the event and specifies whether to return non-public methods.

  • GetType()

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Object.GetType* method.

    public Type GetType ();

    Returns

    • Type

      A Type object.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The GetType method gets the type of the current instance.

  • GetTypeInfo(UInt32,UInt32,IntPtr)

    Retrieves the type information for an object, which can be used to get the type information for an interface.

    public void GetTypeInfo (uint iTInfo, uint lcid, IntPtr ppTInfo);

    Parameters

    • iTInfo
      UInt32

      The type information to return.

    • lcid
      UInt32

      The locale identifier for the type information.

    • ppTInfo
      IntPtr

      A pointer to the requested type information object.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code. For more information about IDispatch::GetTypeInfo, see the MSDN Library.

  • GetTypeInfoCount(UInt32)

    Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).

    public void GetTypeInfoCount (out uint pcTInfo);

    Parameters

    • pcTInfo
      UInt32

      When this method returns, contains a pointer to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object. This parameter is passed uninitialized.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code. For more information about IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount, see the MSDN Library.

  • Invoke(UInt32,Guid,UInt32,Int16,IntPtr,IntPtr,IntPtr,IntPtr)

    Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.

    public void Invoke (uint dispIdMember, ref Guid riid, uint lcid, short wFlags, IntPtr pDispParams, IntPtr pVarResult, IntPtr pExcepInfo, IntPtr puArgErr);

    Parameters

    • dispIdMember
      UInt32

      An identifier for the member.

    • riid
      Guid

      Reserved for future use. Must be IID_NULL.

    • lcid
      UInt32

      The locale context in which to interpret arguments.

    • wFlags
      Int16

      Flags describing the context of the call.

    • pDispParams
      IntPtr

      A pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.

    • pVarResult
      IntPtr

      A pointer to the location where the result will be stored.

    • pExcepInfo
      IntPtr

      A pointer to a structure that contains exception information.

    • puArgErr
      IntPtr

      The index of the first argument that has an error.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code. For more information about IDispatch::Invoke, see the MSDN Library.

  • IsDefined(Type,Boolean)

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined* method.

    public bool IsDefined (Type attributeType, bool inherit);

    Parameters

    • attributeType
      Type

      The Type object to which the custom attributes are applied.

    • inherit
      Boolean

      true to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes; otherwise, false.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if one or more instance of the attributeType parameter is applied to this member; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The IsDefined method indicates whether one or more instances of the attributeType parameter are applied to this member.

  • RemoveEventHandler(Object,Delegate)

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Reflection.EventInfo.RemoveEventHandler* method.

    public void RemoveEventHandler (object target, Delegate handler);

    Parameters

    • target
      Object

      The event source.

    • handler
      Delegate

      The delegate to be disassociated from the events raised by target.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

    The RemoveEventHandler method removes an event handler from an event source.

  • ToString()

    Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the stem.Object.ToString* method.

    public string ToString ();

    Returns

    • String

      A string that represents the current Object.

    Remarks

    This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
